constituent: permit, say, words, keitai, mouth, horse, pantomime horse, noon, sign of the horse
koohiiStory1: If horses could speak, you might have to ask their permission before mounting them.
koohiiStory2: Mr Ed ( a famous talking horse ) was finally at a loss for words when told he would need a permit for public speaking.
myStory: cho phép. chỉ được nói chuyện buổi trưa
words: permit, allow, approve, exempt (from fine), excuse (from), confide in, forgive, pardon, excuse, release, let off
